inclusion.criterion: Weight for height (W/H) <70% of NCHS median
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent from parents/ guardians
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have received antidiarhoeal drugs for their diarrhoea
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe diseases (e.g. severe pneumonia with respiratory distress, clinical sepsis, meningitis) requiring intensive care and other ancillary support like O2 inhalation, oropharyngeal suction etc.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
